name: Auditory Hallucinations
description:
!WARNING! Don't play this game if you have epilepsy!

A flashy horror game that's full of surprises.

Made by 6 students.

Game Artists: 

Fedor - Netherlands, Kaithy - Netherlands, Jonathan - Sweden and Timofei - Finland 

Sound Effects: Timofei - Finland 

Game Developers: Jacob - Netherlands and Onne - Netherlands
